message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split reflects the fact that we both lose money as time passes.
Let's split it evenly this time, Alice.  I think a 50/50 split is fair considering we both lose value as the game goes on.
Bob, I appreciate the sentiment of a 50/50 split, but time is working against you faster than it is against me. Let's be realistic.
Alice, I understand your point about time working against me, but I think a 55/45 split is a more fair reflection of the current value of the money.  We both have to compromise to get this done.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is a compromise - meet me in the middle here.
Alice, I'm willing to concede a bit more, but I believe a 52/48 split is a fair compromise given the time pressure and our decreasing value of the money.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We are both losing out here.  Let's just split it evenly and be done with it.
